description: Detects non-system users failing to get a handle of the SCM database.
name: SCM Database Handle Failure
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"4656" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"SC_MANAGER\ OBJECT" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:"ServicesActive" AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:"0xf003f") AND (NOT (SubjectLogonId:"0x3e4")))
author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g
